header.name: Rodrigo Blefari Gonçalves
header.title: Front-end Software Engineer Mid/Sr | Angular | React

summaryText: Web Developer passionate about technology, with solid experience across multiple stacks (Angular, React, TypeScript, among others). I have worked on projects of different sizes and industries, applying software architecture practices, automated testing (unit and E2E), accessibility, observability, and application security. Experienced with agile methodologies (Scrum/Kanban), micro frontends, design systems, and integration of monitoring tools. Beyond development, I have led teams, hired and trained professionals, ensuring engineering best practices and high-value deliveries to the business. I am also accustomed to direct client interaction, refining requirements and documenting specifications to create success cases. Experienced in bringing value to both back-office platforms and B2C consumer products, actively extracting improvements and discussing MVP scope.

I have worked as a Full Stack Developer throughout most of my career, being responsible for end-to-end (360º) development, management, and implementation of projects. I have experience across the entire application lifecycle, from architecture and coding to testing, deployment, and maintenance. My trajectory includes roles in large enterprises and freelance projects for well-known brands, always applying best practices in engineering, scalability, and security. I have a leadership profile, adapt quickly to new technologies, and focus on delivering efficient, high-impact solutions.
objectiveText: Currently focused on sharpening skills in JavaScript frameworks, especially Angular and React, while occasionally contributing to Node, Java, PHP, C#, and database projects. My ability to ramp up quickly in any language and my commitment to excellence make me a versatile professional, highly adaptable to dynamic challenges.

experience.title: IT Engineering Analyst (Mid-level) (TM)
experience.intro: Frontend Software Engineer working on the Itaú Consumer App (millions of monthly accesses). I started in the Salary Portability journey, responsible for designing end-to-end flows and improvements based on metrics and data, leading refinements, documentation and full development, evolving customer-centric journeys into a robust solution with unit tests and a modern Design System.

Data analysis: Metric-driven flows, documentation, test scenarios, and complete flowcharts.
Architecture & development: WebView and Microfrontends (Angular/React), evolving solutions from Voxel to the new IDS (Itaú Design System).
Observability: Implemented Datadog, FullStory, and GA4 with dashboards and strategic metrics.
Quality & testing: High unit test coverage with Jest/Karma and E2E with Cypress.
Journey architecture: Active participation in strategic meetings across the entire value stream.
